articles.author: Barbara Starr and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: US places up to 8,500 troops on alert for possible deployment to Eastern Europe amid Russia tensions - CNN
articles.description: As many as 8,500 US troops have been put on heightened alert for a possible deployment to Eastern Europe as Russian troops mass on Ukraine's border, Pentagon spokesman John Kirby said Monday.
articles.content:
(CNN)As many as 8,500 US troops have been put on heightened alert for a possible deployment to Eastern Europe as Russian troops mass on Ukraine's border, Pentagon spokesman John Kirby said Monday.

articles.title: NATO deploys troops, ships amid concerns over Russian invansion of Ukraine - India Today
articles.description: NATO deployed more forces and reinforced eastern Europe with more ships and fighter jets, in what Russia denounced as an escalation of tensions over Ukraine.
